Initialized(uint8).details: Triggered when the contract has been initialized or reinitialized.

acceptOwnership().details: The new owner accepts the ownership transfer.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

pendingOwner().details: Returns the address of the pending owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

setAccessControlManager(address).details: Admin function to set address of AccessControlManager

params.accessControlManager_: The new address of the AccessControlManager

transferOwnership(address).details: Starts the ownership transfer of the contract to a new account. Replaces the pending transfer if there is one. Can only be called by the current owner.

InvalidMaxIncreaseBps().notice: Thrown when a maxIncreaseBps value of 0 is set

OnlyRiskStewardReceiver().notice: Thrown when the update is not coming from the RiskStewardReceiver

Unauthorized(address,address,string).notice: Thrown when the action is prohibited by AccessControlManager

UnsupportedUpdateType().notice: Thrown when an updateType that is not supported is operated on

UpdateNotInRange().notice: Thrown when the new value of an update is our of range

BorrowCapUpdated(address,uint256).notice: Emitted when a borrow cap is updated

MaxIncreaseBpsUpdated(uint256,uint256).notice: Emitted when the max increase bps is updated

NewAccessControlManager(address,address).notice: Emitted when access control manager contract address is changed

SupplyCapUpdated(address,uint256).notice: Emitted when a supply cap is updated

CORE_POOL_COMPTROLLER().notice: Address of the CorePool comptroller used for selecting the correct comptroller abi

RISK_STEWARD_RECEIVER().notice: Address of the RiskStewardReceiver used for to validate incoming updates

accessControlManager().notice: Returns the address of the access control manager contract

maxIncreaseBps().notice: The max increase bps for the update relative to the current value

userdoc.notice: Contract that can update supply and borrow caps received from RiskStewardReceiver
